entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
